div.bibl: Lietuva, Vol. I, No. 15, April 22, 1893. THE COLUMBIA EXPOSITION IN CHICAGO

body.p: This is the greatest event in the history of Chicago. This great exhibition will open on the first day of May.

At this exposition there will be people and rulers from all over the world. There will be animals, beasts and birds from all parts of the world. There will be all kinds of machinery that man's ingenuity can produce. Those and many other things you can see at this exposition only, but not at any other places.
Therefore, Lithuanians, do not miss seeing this greatest exhibition on earth.
